input_email_body:
Subject: Connectivity Issue: Unable to Send Slack Messages on Desktop

Dear Customer Support,

I am reaching out regarding my connectivity issues with Slack version 4.23.0 on my desktop You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. I am unable to send messages, causing serious disruption in team communications My name is Liu Wei.. I have already tried the built-in fixes and troubleshooting steps provided by Slack support, but unfortunately, these attempts have not resolved the issue.

I appreciate your prompt assistance in finding a solution. If you require any additional information or further details, please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience.

Warm regards,

<name>
